About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

"I am a dedicated Front-End Developer and Quality Assurance professional with a strong passion for building responsive and visually appealing websites. Over the past few years, I've honed my skills in converting Figma designs into fully functional and responsive websites using HTML5, CSS3/SASS, and JavaScript. I also have hands-on experience with popular front-end frameworks like React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap, as well as version control systems like Git/GitHub. "

In addition to my front-end development expertise, I have experience in Quality Assurance, where I ensure that web applications meet high standards of functionality and design. My work in QA involves rigorous testing, bug tracking using Jira, and collaborating closely with developers to enhance the user experience.

My commitment to continuous learning and professional growth drives me to stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, enabling me to deliver high-quality results in every project I undertake.

Front-End Developer (Freelancer)

Over the past few years, I have worked as a Front-End Developer, focusing on converting Figma designs into responsive and visually appealing websites. My expertise lies in using HTML5, CSS3/SASS, and JavaScript, along with modern front-end technologies like React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap. I also manage version control with Git and GitHub, ensuring seamless collaboration and code management.

Jan 2023 - Present (8 months)

In my role as a QA professional, I am responsible for ensuring the quality of the Homoltak Project, an application for vehicle drivers transporting various materials and goods. I conduct thorough testing of new application versions, focusing on both functionality and user experience (UX). I utilize Jira for tracking bugs and coordinating with developers to ensure that the application adheres to the highest standards.

As a Production Coordinator, I was involved in managing daily operations, coordinating between different departments, and ensuring timely delivery of services.
